name: trendily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is modern and influenced by the most recent fashions or ideas: The bar was full of trendily dressed people drinking cocktails. He wore a white shirt and a trendily patterned silk tie.
More examplesFewer examplesThe trendily cosmopolitan menu includes dishes such as tzatziki and gazpacho.Like many modern crime writers, her stories trendily feature lots of DNA analysis and computer hacking.The book covers have been trendily redesigned in a swirling blend of orange, black, and white.
